characters.name: Kafka Hibino
characters.description:
__Height:__ 181 cm

Kafka Hibino, also known as Monster #8, is a Defense Force member and a former worker for the Professional Kaiju Cleaning Company "Monster Sweeper Inc.". Kafka's personality is a bit childish and funny, as well as a very determined and dedicated person who loves his comrades dearly.

After a kaijuu managed to enter his body, he obtained the ability to turn himself into a humanoid kaijuu.

characters.name: Reno Ichikawa
characters.description: He briefly worked at Monster Sweeper Inc, where he met and befriended Kafka Hibino. After witnessing Kafka's transformation, Reno helped him enter the Defense Force and joined with him. ~!He was a member of the Third Division and after destruction of Tachikawa Base he was transferred to the Fourth Division.!~

characters.name: Kikoru Shinomiya
characters.description:
__Height__: 157cm

She is the young daughter of Defense Force Director General Isao Shinomiya and a member of the Third Division. After Tachikawa Base was destroyed, Kikoru was transferred to the First Division.

characters.name: Mina Ashiro
characters.description: Mina is a very talented member of the Defense Force and an extremely talented marksman. She is the captain of the Defense Force's Third Division. When she was a child, she and [Kafka](https://anilist.co/character/180692/Kafka-Hibino) met each other after a Kaiju attack, swearing that they will both join the Defense Force and fight Kaiju alongside each other.

characters.name: Soushirou Hoshina
characters.description:
__Height:__ 171 cm

Soushirou is a Vice-Commander of the Defense Force's Third Division. Despite his laid back nature, he is shown to be very powerful, specializing with bladed weapons.

Soushirou comes from a family of Kaijuu slayers dating back to the Muromachi Period.

characters.name: Gen Narumi
characters.description:
Gen Narumi is the Captain of the First Division of the Defense Force. He is known to be Japan's strongest anti-kaiju combatant, hence his position.

Gen has a rather lazy and child-like personality, obsessing over followers on social media and video games as well as his action figures. He appears informal and rude when confronting other people. Despite this, he is serious about his work, valuing skills above all else, and demanding results from all those serving in his division.

characters.name: Isao Shinomiya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190 cm

Isao Shinomiya is the Director General of the Defense Force and Kikoru Shinomiya's father.

Isao is a very authoritative and serious man, being also very demanding towards both his subordinates and his daughter. As the Director General of the Defense Force and serving many years in its ranks, Isao is a far-sighted man who gives his orders firmly in sight of future threats. Isao is not above using living kaiju as weapons to empower the Defense Force.

Despite is apparent cold and serious behavior, Isao shows a more human side when he remembered Kikoru's words about Kafka Hibino and when he personally informed the latter about his decision towards him, going against his high-ranked colleagues to give Kafka a chance to prove himself to them.

characters.name: Kaijuu Kyuu-gou
characters.description:
The main antagonist in the manga Kaiju No. 8. Kaiju No. 9 is a humanoid numbered Daikaiju who goes around reviving the kaiju killed by the Defense Force. He previously infiltrated Professional Kaiju Cleaning Company Monster Sweeper.

~! In his fused form with an Ant-type kaiju, No. 9 has the lower part of his body replaced by an Ant kaiju which he controls and uses to move around. In this form, No. 9 lacks forearms and hands. !~ ~! After fusing with Kaiju No. 2, No. 9 is now much larger than before, keeping his darker skin tone, with a long tail, three sets of eyes, and only protuberance on his head instead of two. !~

characters.name: Keiji Itami
characters.description:
__Height__: 178cm

Deputy Director of the Japan Anti-Kaiju Defense Force even though he dislikes being in a position of power over others. He likes quiet places, taiga (historical) dramas and tangerines.

characters.name: Hikari Shinomiya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm

Hikari Shinomiya was a former Captain of the Second Division of the Defense Force and Vice-Captain of the First Division. She was also the wife of [Isao Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/257340/Isao-Shinomiya) and mother of [Kikoru Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/183889/Kikoru-Shinomiya).

Hikari used to be very strong yet understanding and caring individual, as well as being more jovial and lively than her husband Isao.

characters.name: Rin Shinonome
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm
__Occupation:__ Platoon Leader in the First Division of the Defense Force

Rin is a serious woman who follows Captain [Gen Narumi](https://anilist.co/character/241577/Gen-Narumi)'s order without question, despite letting her guard down sometimes. She is a calm individual who faces things correctly, still managing to have fun while doing so. Rin also seem to take a liking in brave people. Her brave and rigid behavior, however, is sometimes a shield to hide her deep emotions of joy and excitement. She also seems to secretly cultivate her physical appareance and beauty.

~!Behind her strong and menacing demeanor, Rin hides a huge admiration for Gen Narumi's strength, feeling this emotions ever since her first battle with him in the First Division. During the years, the desire to be acknowledged by him brought Rin to strive to become stronger and more beautiful, just to impress Narumi. To this day, she holds dear the memory of when Gen promoted her to Platoon Leader, and still struggles prove her worth and follow Gen's footsteps. In fact, Rin's hidden closeness and deep link to her division comrades even pushes her to fight with her life on the line to fulfill her duty.!~

characters.name: Eiji Hasegawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 210 cm
__Occupation:__ First Division Vice-Captain

Eiji is a professional and formal man who takes his job very seriously, for this reason he often clashes with Captain [Gen Narumi](https://anilist.co/character/241577/Gen-Narumi)'s childish behavior. For his inflexible demeanor on duty and for his usual leadership role in the First Divsion, Eiji is highly respected by anyone both in his own division and in others.

characters.name: Aoi Kaguragi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm

Aoi Kaguragi is a young member of the Third Division of the Defense Force.

~!After the destruction of Tachikawa Base, he was transferred to the Second Division.!~

~!Aoi was a rising star on Japan Ground Self-Defense Force, but turned down his future in the JGSDF to apply to the Defense Force.!~

characters.name: Iharu Furuhashi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm

Iharu Furuhashi is a young officer of the Third Division of the Defense Force.

~!After the destruction of Tachikawa Base, he was transferred to the Fourth Division.!~

~!Back when Iharu was still in middle school, he was saved from a kaiju by [Mina Ashiro](https://anilist.co/character/180693/Mina-Ashiro). This event would later inspire him to become a Defense Force member.!~

characters.name: Haruichi Izumo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm

Haruichi Izumo is a wealthy young man and a prominent member of the Third Division of the Defense Force. Haruichi is also the scion of Izumo Tech.

characters.name: Konomi Okonogi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 149 cm
__Occupation:__ Third Division Operations Leader

Konomi is a determined and professional person. She doesn't seem to approve of [Soushirou Hoshina](https://anilist.co/character/205579/Soushirou-Hoshina)'s unprofessional remarks and blurts of laughter, caring deeply for him and for everyone else when they are in danger. In return, she's held in high regard by Soushirou.

While working, Konomi displays a professional and serious behavior, quickly getting a grasp of the current situation to offer support to her comrades. She also displayed remarkable levels of intuition and analytical skills.

characters.name: Kaijuu 10-gou
characters.description:
Kaiju Juu-gou is an Identified Kaiju who attacked Tachikawa Base. It is created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou) and is considered a "prototype". ~!It was then weaponized into Numbers Weapon 10, currently used by [Soushirou Hoshina](https://anilist.co/character/205579/Soushirou-Hoshina).!~ 

~!Its fight with Soushirou Hoshina managed to excite it so much that, even after being defeated, it still felt linked to Soushirou and wished to be turned into a weapon for him, to fight with him once more. Kaiju Juu-gou seems to be a rather independent individual, easily betraying its progenitor Kaijuu Kyuu-gou just to get closer to Soushirou.!~ 

Kaiju Juu-gou is a extremely powerful Identified Kaiju, with a fortitude level of 8.3 when it first appeared, ~!and 9.0 after growing larger in size.!~

characters.name: Touko
characters.description: Touko is a member of the Fourth Division of the Defense Force.

characters.name: Juugo Ogata
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm

Juugo Ogata is the Captain of the Fourth Division of the Defense Force.

Juugo seems to be a rather calm and peaceful individual, wishing to get along with his fellow division captains despite their hot-blooded and belligerent behaviours. He's not above drinking alcohol or plucking his nose hair when on duty.

characters.name: Ichitaka Miike
characters.description: Employee at the professional Kaiju cleanup company Monster Sweeper Inc.

characters.name: Souichirou Hoshina
characters.description:
__Height__: 176cm

Souichirou Hoshina is the Captain of the Sixth Division of the Defense Force. Soushirou Hoshina is his brother. He likes okonomiyaki, Mont Blanc, naps, and victory.

characters.name: Hiroto Mori
characters.description: Hiroto Mori is a man working at Professional Kaiju Cleanup Company Monster Sweeper Inc.

characters.name: Masahide Tokuda
characters.description:
__Height:__ 188 cm

Masahide Tokuda also known as Toku is a man working at Professional Kaiju Cleaning Company Monster Sweeper Inc.

characters.name: Chieko Tokuda
characters.description: Chieko Tokuda is the daughter of Masahide Tokuda.

characters.name: Kaijuu Juuzou-gou
characters.description: Kaijuu Juuzou-gou is one of the many Identified Kaiju created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou).

characters.name: Kaijuu Juugo-gou
characters.description: Kaijuu Juugo-gou was one of the many Identified Kaiju created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou). It was created to defeat [Kikoru Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/183889/Kikoru-Shinomiya).

characters.name: Kaijuu Juuni-gou
characters.description: Kaijuu Juuni-gou is one of the many Identified Kaiju created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou).

characters.name: Kaijuu Ichi-gou
characters.description: Kaiju Ichi-gou, also known as The Future Sight Kaiju, was the first Identified Kaiju to ever receive an I.D. number. After its death, it was turned into Numbers Weapon 1, currently used by First Division Captain [Gen Narumi](https://anilist.co/character/241577/Gen-Narumi).

characters.name: Akira Kurusu
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm

Operations Leader of the First Division in the Defense Force. He used to be Director Isao Shinomiya's personal aid in battle.

characters.name: Tachibana
characters.description:
__Ocuppation:__ Platoon Leader in the First Division of the Defense Force

Tachibana seems to be a quite serious individual, despite being oftenly surprised in the battle field. He also seems to get irritated quite easily.

~!Ever since joining the First Division, Tachibana trained and witnessed her countless attempts to become stronger and more beautiful in order to impress Captain [Gen Narumi](https://anilist.co/character/241577/Gen-Narumi).
At some point, Tachibana was promoted to Platoon Leader.!~

characters.name: Jura Igarashi
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Second Division Captain

Jura is a serious and short-tempered individual, getting easily disturbed and angry when her colleagues take it easy while on-duty.

characters.name: Kurusu
characters.description:
Kurusu is a member of the Defense Force and Director [Isao Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/257340/Isao-Shinomiya)'s personal aid in battle.

Kurusu is very serious and always aware of the kaiju threat he analyses. He seems to be extremely loyal to Isao Shinomiya, caring about his well-being ~!and even aiding him in his dangerous fight against [Kaiju Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou) to avoid leaving the Director alone.!~

characters.name: Juzo Nogizaka
characters.description:
Nogizaka is a high-ranking member of the Defense Force.

Nogizaka is very rational when making decisions, making him clash with [Isao Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/257340/Isao-Shinomiya)'s new ideals for the next generation. In spite of that, he still trusts and respects the Director. He seems to get annoyed when denied a chance to fight.

characters.name: Bakko
characters.description:
Bakko is a tiger owned by [Mina Ashiro](https://anilist.co/character/180693/Mina-Ashiro)

Bakko seems to be rather calm and totally obedient to his owner Mina.

Always present at Mina's side, even in battle, Bakko is inferred to be strong enough to take on and possibly eliminate kaiju.

characters.name: Sebas
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Butler

Sebas is the butler of the Shinomiya Family and serves [Kikoru Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/183889/Kikoru-Shinomiya).

Sebas appears as a calm man in a subservient relationship with Kikoru. ~!He is also very protective towards her since he hit [Kafka Hibino](https://anilist.co/character/180692/Kafka-Hibino) just for touching Kikoru.!~

characters.name: Takao
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Third Division Platoon Leader

During the Raid on Tachikawa Base, Takao and his sniper platoon arrived to aid the rest of the Third Division against the airborne Wyvern-type kaiju.

characters.name: Ebina
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Third Division Platoon Leader

As a Platoon Leader, Ebina is inferred to be a top-notch Officer of the Defense Force, able to take multiple kaiju and guide his men in battle with determination.

characters.name: Tae Nakanoshima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 163 cm
__Occupation:__ Third Division Platoon Leader

Tae seems to be some kind of "man-eater", praising the newbies in the platoon not only for their fighting ability but also for their looks.

Tae seems to have a rivalry with [Rin Shinonome](https://anilist.co/character/305763/Rin-Shinonome)

characters.name: Itakura
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Third Division Platoon Leader

During the Raid on Tachikawa Base, his platoon arrived to aid the rest of the Third Division against the wyvern-type kaiju, securing the storehouse area.

characters.name: Ryou Ikaruga
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187 cm
__Occupation:__ Third Division Platoon Leader

Ryou seems to have a rivarly with [Tachibana](https://anilist.co/character/305762/Tachibana)

characters.name: Kaijuu 4-gou
characters.description:
Kaijuu Yon-gou was an Identified Kaiju. After its death, it was turned into Numbers Weapon #4, formerly used by [Hikari Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/305720/Hikari-Shinomiya) ~!and currently used by [Kikoru Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/183889/Kikoru-Shinomiya).!~

Even as a Numbers Weapon, Kaijuu Yon-gou seems to vividly remember its past user Hikari Shinomiya, ~!since her ghost is clearly visible to its current user [Kikoru Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/183889/Kikoru-Shinomiya). The Kaiju also seems to be very observational and judgemental with Kikoru.!~

characters.name: Kaijuu 2-gou
characters.description:
Kaijuu 2-gou was an Identified Kaiju and the second kaiju to ever recieve an I.D. number. After being killed by the Defense Force, it was converted into [Isao Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/257340/Isao-Shinomiya)'s Numbers Weapon #2 ~!before being eventually absorbed by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou).!~

According to [Keiji Itami](https://anilist.co/character/305719/Keiji-Itami), Kaijuu 2-gou had an immense sense of pride, holding on to it until its very death.

In 1972, Kaijuu 2-gou attacked and nearly destroyed Sapporo, until it was defeated and killed by the Defense Force. Its corpse was then repurposed as the base for Isao Shinomiya's combat suit and gauntlets.

characters.name: Soratobu Kaijuu
characters.description: This unnamed kaiju is the one responsible for infecting [Kafka Hibino](https://anilist.co/character/180692) and turning him into Kaiju 8-gou.

characters.name: Touma Takanashi
characters.description: Touma Takanashi is a Defense Force officer in the Third Division.

characters.name: Hikaru Kaijuu
characters.description: This unnamed kaiju is one of the many kaiju created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou).

characters.name: Kanji Nagamine
characters.description: Kanji Nagamine was one of the victims of [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou) and its second disguise.

characters.name: Kaijuu Roku-gou
characters.description:
Kaijuu Roku-gou also known as The King of Kaiju was an Identified Kaiju that was neutralized by the Defense Force ten years ago. After its death, it was converted into Numbers Weapon 6.
~!The Numbers Weapon 6 is currently used by Fourth Division officer [Reno Ichikawa](https://anilist.co/character/180694/Reno-Ichikawa).!~

characters.name: Hakua Igarashi
characters.description: Hakua Igarashi is a Defense Force officer in the Third Division.

characters.name: Akari Minase
characters.description:
__Height:__ 153 cm

Akari Minase is a Defense Force officer of the Third Division.

characters.name: Kaijuu Juuyon-gou
characters.description: Kaijuu Juuyon-gou is one of the many Identified Kaiju created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou).

characters.name: Kaijuu Juuichi-gou
characters.description: Kaijuu Juuichi-gou is one of the many Identified Kaiju created by [Kaijuu Kyuu-gou](https://anilist.co/character/259598/Kaijuu-Kyuugou).
